name: Drop-It
description:
Very satisfying game where you merge cubes together to create bigger cubes (like 2048), Only in this game you lose some control aspects because every merge will create a shockwave!

The purpose of this game is to get the highest score! 

You will lose if you touch the red line for 10 seconds without moving, so keep the cubes flowing.

Cubes will by default explode at 32, you can change this at the settings menu.

My high score is 2084, Can you beat that?
